name: Archerfish Simulator
description:
Jump and shoot to squash the crickets and create chain reactions! Inspired by Beetle Mania (Super Mario RPG). Created for GMTK Jam 2017 using Game Maker Studio 1.4, Aseprite, and BFXR.

A Windows game by:

Eric Biernacki (Design, Sound, Code)

Marco Duran (Design, Code)

Jackie Ortiz (Art)
